news.title: Ombudsman launches criminal investigation after man (51) allegedly pushed by garda dies in hospital
news.summary: A 51-year-old man who suffered critical head injuries after being allegedly pushed by a garda has died in hospital.

news.title: Helen McEntee joins senior Fine Gael figures backing Heather Humphreys as she leads Seán Kelly in presidency bid
news.summary: Heather Humphreys’ lead has grown significantly in the hours since she and MEP Seán Kelly announced they would seek the Fine Gael nomination to run for president.

news.title: Holly Baxter: Donald Trump’s meeting with Volodymyr Zelensky was even worse than their last Oval Office encounter
news.summary: After Friday’s red carpet love-in with Russian leader Vladimir Putin, US president Donald Trump sat down with Ukraine’s Volodymyr Zelensky yesterday at the Oval Office to talk peace and the world hoped it would go better than the last White House meeting between the US and Ukraine.

news.title: Man accused of stealing €17,000 from bank customers while having USB device containing alleged victims’ personal info
news.summary: A man is alleged to have stolen more than €17,000 from bank customers, including a loan taken out in one man’s name, while in possession of a USB storage device containing victims’ personal information, a court heard.

news.title: Martin Breheny: Plan to pay managers is clearly on the GAA’s agenda – and that raises some serious questions
news.summary: It’s official – paying inter-county GAA managers a salary is up for discussion. So is paying fees for professional services provided by backroom personnel.

news.title: Nato leaders expected to meet to discuss Ukraine as Russia launches largest attack
Rose of Tralee review: Dog yoga and the Jumbo Breakfast Roll – did what I’ve been watching really happen, or am I hallucinating?
news.summary: It’s around the two-hour mark on night one of  The Rose of Tralee  (RTÉ One, Monday, August 18) that the existential mini-crisis hits: did what I’ve been watching really happen, or did I just imagine all of it?

news.title: Two dozen villagers pool savings of €300,000 to save their local pub from closing down
news.summary: A group of villagers have prevented their local pub from closing down by pooling their savings to keep it open.

news.title: Can my late brother’s child remove contents from the home, even though his widow still lives there?
news.summary: Query:  Dear Mary Frances, I read your recent article about a life interest in a property and it prompted me to write to you as we have a really terrible situation in our family.

news.title: Five things we learnt this morning as the presidential race heats up
news.summary: As a Fine Gael internal battle gets underway, other parties and candidates are under pressure.
